text: Avoid the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-52-77A4 17.3" 144Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-52-77A4 17.3" 144Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.

Had several issues with the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-52-77A4 17.3" 144Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-52-77A4 17.3" 144Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The battery life has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Avoid the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-52-77A4 17.3" 144Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.
